attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a definate lack of courses available to the unemployed and over 25's in local areas. i.e Hackney.

I am an unemployed graduate who has  been unemployed for the duration of two years. I was recently informed that by my local job centre department that there are no courses available to me other than NEW DEAL back to work. This is due to lack of funding. I soon discovered that a local college in the East-end of london offers courses like Sound Engineering, which is of great interest to me is not available to over 25's
